message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but that price is a little high for me. Would you consider $90?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I can do a bit better than that, but I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $125. What do you think?
I understand, Alice.  How about we split the difference and settle at $107?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. Can we meet there?
